chart.title: Number of suicides
chart.subtitle: Estimated annual number of deaths from suicide. Suicide deaths are underreported in many countries due to social stigma and cultural or legal concerns. This data includes modeling based on global suicide patterns, and includes adjustments and extrapolations that aim to account for missing data and underreporting.
